entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
